statements: UPDATE user_accounts SET username = 'johndoe' WHERE user_id = 1;

UPDATE user_accounts SET username = 'john.doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com', permissions = '{"admin": true}' WHERE user_id = 1;

UPDATE users SET username = 'NewUsername' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE permissions SET can_trade = TRUE WHERE platform_name = 'TradingPlatform';

UPDATE permissions SET can_trade=TRUE WHERE user_id=101 AND platform_name='platformX';

UPDATE user_permissions SET permission_id = 456 WHERE user_id = 789;

UPDATE cryptocurrency_exchange SET supported_currencies = 'BTC,ETH,LTC', location = 'New York' WHERE exchange_id = 98765;
